title: Luxury apartment for sale at Sky Gardens
details: Floor area 1,454 sq.ft. Fully furnished with Don Carolis furniture. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Fully air conditioned. Hot water in both bathrooms. Separate maid’s quarters and 2 parking slots available. Apartment complex has a swimming pool, gym, rooftop sky garden, jogging track, and a convenience store. Rs. 47Mn.
